title: johnsaributua
author: johnsaributua
content: where can I make an offer to exchange tokens that are not yet listed?? with fiat or bitcoin?? for sale and purchase, is it possible here? Or board other?

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: If you want to trade your shitcoin to the other altcoins or fiat you can create new thread in this section Marketplace (Altcoins)If you want to trade your shitcoin to Bitcoin, you can create new thread in this section Currency exchangeYou need to write if you shitcoin isn't tradable in any exchanges and you must not promise to the other users if your shitcoin will added in exchange or offer unrealistic APY in x day/week/month (s).

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on December 19, 2022, 12:09:21 AMwhere can I make an offer to exchange tokens that are not yet listed?? with fiat or bitcoin?? for sale and purchase, is it possible here? Or board other?P2P is the only way and the boards were mentioned by jawhead. But sad to say that there's no exchange on it that it is listed.And that means that there's likely no one that would like to take that offer. I've seen the same post of people wanting to dump their mined pi coins on the marketplace(altcoins) and it seems that no one has taken those deals.Well, you can also try at least.

comments.author: johnsaributua
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on December 19, 2022, 09:11:24 AMIf you want to trade your shitcoin to the other altcoins or fiat you can create new thread in this section Marketplace (Altcoins)If you want to trade your shitcoin to Bitcoin, you can create new thread in this section Currency exchangeYou need to write if you shitcoin isn't tradable in any exchanges and you must not promise to the other users if your shitcoin will added in exchange or offer unrealistic APY in x day/week/month (s).this think that a lot of categories that i need to try, not too bad cause i've read before on the board that you mentioned for an exchange only a few people. but good advice guysQuote from: sunsilk on December 19, 2022, 11:40:07 AM~snip~And that means that there's likely no one that would like to take that offer. I've seen the same post of people wanting to dump their mined pi coins on the marketplace(altcoins) and it seems that no one has taken those deals.Well, you can also try at least.this has to do with the risks that must be faced before the market opens (maybe) not sure when it will be opened from the developer either. but for a collection I think they are only concerned with the art of saving (there is happiness when Hodl) maybe there will be my fortune d there. even though the possibility is a little hahaha. if an analyst in this forum for pi investment, I'm not sure. but if only for collection maybe it could be.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on December 19, 2022, 12:03:17 PMQuote from: sunsilk on December 19, 2022, 11:40:07 AM~snip~And that means that there's likely no one that would like to take that offer. I've seen the same post of people wanting to dump their mined pi coins on the marketplace(altcoins) and it seems that no one has taken those deals.Well, you can also try at least.this has to do with the risks that must be faced before the market opens (maybe) not sure when it will be opened from the developer either. but for a collection I think they are only concerned with the art of saving (there is happiness when Hodl) maybe there will be my fortune d there. even though the possibility is a little hahaha. if an analyst in this forum for pi investment, I'm not sure. but if only for collection maybe it could be.It's been so long since it's been offered by other people and they also said the same thing about opening the markets or being listed to an exchange but it never happened.If for collection purposes and display, well, you may really have hard time finding that person that will consider it as a good choice to hold. It's starting to be known that pi is worthless. Sorry to say that but that's what I think it is when I've read a lot of negative things about it. Still, good luck.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on December 19, 2022, 12:09:21 AMwhere can I make an offer to exchange tokens that are not yet listed?? with fiat or bitcoin?? for sale and purchase, is it possible here? Or board other?I don't know who can exchange their currencies such as Bitcoin and currencies of high value with currencies that are not listed and have no value. Yes, there are boards here, so you can publish a topic about that, and I hope that you will find someone to help you in these transactions, although I doubt that there will be someone who will have the desire to obtain these shitcoins like Pi network. You can always deal with members with high rank, or you can use an Escrow service so that the safety rate is high, and stay away from scammers who ask you to send your coins first via private messages.

comments.author: Chopit
comments.body: My brother in law invested a lot with this Pi network but got REKT. Very disappointing !Quote from: johnsaributua on December 19, 2022, 12:09:21 AMwhere can I make an offer to exchange tokens that are not yet listed?? with fiat or bitcoin?? for sale and purchase, is it possible here? Or board other?

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Quote from: Chopit on December 24, 2022, 06:44:04 AMMy brother in law invested a lot with this Pi network but got REKT. Very disappointing !How can your brother invest in this project while you can easily mine it with phone and there's no exchange accept this shitcoin?

comments.author: TheGreatPython
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on December 24, 2022, 10:54:18 AMQuote from: Chopit on December 24, 2022, 06:44:04 AMMy brother in law invested a lot with this Pi network but got REKT. Very disappointing !How can your brother invest in this project while you can easily mine it with phone and there's no exchange accept this shitcoin?Well, this coin have became trendy all of sudden and then there are left and right offers for those want to buy or sell the coin. I know you can mine it on your own but that can take a lot of time and as far as I know, it's also hard to withdraw your coins outside this pi mining app.You need to go through a rigorous process (different levels of KYC and other stuffs) but I won't recommend anyone to get involved on this one. I think this was all about the hypes and like any other shady projects, it's hyped are soon going to subside. There are still a lot of good cryptos out there that can give us a decent profit but with lesser risk, so why choose pi?

Or board other?If you still want to sell them I can offer 0.8$/Pi, contact me on telegram @blackhat890403
